question_text:
Question 26 
[Geomatics Engineering : Theodolites & Plane Table Surveying]
A surveyor observes a zenith angle of 
0
93 00' 00"
 during a theodolite survey. The corresponding vertical
angle is
(A) 
0
03 00' 00"

 
(B) 
0
03 00' 00"

(C) 
0
87 00' 00"

 
(D) 
0
87 00' 00"

